page.title: 19Middleton Tyas C.E. School
page.content: This primary school is situated on {School Bank}in the village of Middleton Tyas and serves much of the area in our block. The main building was erected in 1863 and the temporary classroom in the school yard was added in 1974. It is what is called a {Voluntary Controlled School.}There are 53 children on roll at the moment. {Miss Thom}is the{Headteacher}and she teaches the{Upper Junior class. Mrs {Ayre}teaches the{Lower Juniors. Mrs {Shannon}retired as{Infant teacher}in July after ten years at this scool and her replacement is{Mrs Ford}who is Scottish. The{School Secretary}is{Mrs {Brown}and the{Caretaker Mrs Porritt.} The{School Cook, Mrs W Smith} is helped in her work by{Mrs Skelton}and {Mrs Allan.}
